title: 多世界禁止刷怪
author: 魔联盟
txt_content: 世界的配置文件。找到world，找到你要改的那个世界名称。下面有怪物spawn的选项，改成false就好。直接保存

replies.author: zheng00
replies.txt_content: 标题: 多世界禁止刷怪RT
difficulty 0和平/mv modify set difficulty 0/gamerule doMobSpawning false关闭生成怪物

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
到指定世界输入
/gamerule doMobSpawning false 
即可

replies.author: zheng00
replies.txt_content:
qq1812538626 发表于 2016-7-17 20:31
到指定世界输入
/gamerule doMobSpawning false 
即可
试过了没用

replies.author: 背着书包丶
replies.txt_content:
/mv modify set difficulty 0 
多世界插件是这个指令。

replies.author: Muyu816
replies.txt_content: /gamerule doMobSpawning false   输入后只是不刷怪了，然后输入清怪指令/butcher即可
